cms.query.QueryText: SELECT ##TOPN## * FROM CMS_WorkflowScope WHERE (ScopeSiteID = @ScopeSiteID) AND (ScopeWorkflowID IN (SELECT WorkflowID FROM CMS_Workflow WHERE WorkflowEnabled = 1)) AND (ScopeClassID = @ScopeClassID OR ScopeClassID IS NULL) AND (ScopeCultureID = @ScopeCultureID OR ScopeCultureID IS NULL) AND ((ScopeStartingPath = '/' OR @NodeAliasPath LIKE ScopeStartingPath + '/%' OR @NodeAliasPath LIKE ScopeStartingPath) AND -- Special case for root (ScopeStartingPath <> '/%' OR @NodeAliasPath <> '/') AND -- Do not select scope with excluded children unless it is the node itself (ScopeExcludeChildren <> 1 OR ScopeExcludeChildren IS NULL OR ScopeStartingPath = @NodeAliasPath)) ORDER BY ##ORDERBY##
